title: What % of people in each state are poor?
comments:
Quick answer is corruption. Detailed answer will require PhD work. 

There is not enough investment in any social infrastructure - education, health, public safety.  Casteism still rules.  In the end you have a population that is not moving up. Politicians beurocrat nexus  find this convenient for their corruption
